body:
Just going through the versions supported by Spack, i wanted to ask if allowing people to install versions of git that are insecure is a good idea, as curators of a package collection. 
I know with LMOD i can deprecate modules, to warn people away
https://lmod.readthedocs.io/en/latest/140_deprecating_modules.html

is there a way to throw a warning about issues like this planned?
title: CVE-2018-11235: Git remote code execution vulnerability
